title: Celebrating 20 Years, Complaint Letter, Sheryl Underwood, Coronavirus and more.
itunes:title: Celebrating 20 Years, Complaint Letter, Sheryl Underwood, Coronavirus and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are celebrating 20 years of "How you like me now?" Steve and Shirley talk about the early days and the crew talk about what it is today. Do you have a specific product that reminds you of your childhood? Frosted Flakes ring a bell? We got a complaint from a listener about one of our Strawberry Letters involving Trump. Kobe Bryant's memorabilia is causing some issues with Ebay. Sheryl Underwood has much to say about black radio and black media. Federal health officials are warning about the inevitable spread of the coronavirus nationally. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog explains why loyalty has an expiration date, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
